00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : Parameters
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : David S. Whyte [david(at)ihpc.a-star.edu.sg]
00005 !              Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]

00032 
00033  SUBROUTINE Parameters
00034 
00035 ! Common Variables
00036  USE NTypes, ONLY : DBL
00037  USE Domain
00038  USE FluidParams
00039  USE LBMParams
00040  USE MPIParams, ONLY : master, mpi_xdim, mpi_ydim, proc
00041  USE MPI
00042  IMPLICIT NONE
00043 
00044 ! Local Variables
00045  INTEGER :: i
00046  INTEGER :: IO_ERR, MPI_ERR
00047  INTEGER, DIMENSION (1:10) :: intParam
00048  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION (1:8) :: dblParam
00049  REAL(KIND = DBL), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:) :: bubblesVec
00050 
00051 
00052 ! Read parameter data from file in master node
00053  IF (proc == master) THEN
00054    OPEN(UNIT = 10, FILE = "properties.in", STATUS = "OLD", ACTION = "READ", &
00055         IOSTAT = IO_ERR)
00056    IF ( IO_ERR == 0 ) THEN
00057      READ(10,*)
00058      READ(10,*) Maxstep
00059      READ(10,*)
00060      READ(10,*) tStat, tDump
00061      READ(10,*)
00062      READ(10,*) xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax
00063      READ(10,*)
00064      READ(10,*) rhoL, rhoH
00065      READ(10,*)
00066      READ(10,*) tauRho, tauPhi
00067      READ(10,*)
00068      READ(10,*) IntWidth, sigma, Gamma
00069      READ(10,*)
00070      READ(10,*) pConv
00071      READ(10,*)
00072      READ(10,*) mpi_xdim, mpi_ydim
00073      CLOSE(UNIT = 10)
00074    ELSE
00075      CALL MPI_FINALIZE(MPI_ERR)
00076      STOP "Error: Unable to open input file 'properties.in'."
00077    END IF
00078 
00079    intParam(1) = MaxStep
00080    intParam(2) = tStat
00081    intParam(3) = tDump
00082    intParam(4) = xmin
00083    intParam(5) = xmax
00084    intParam(6) = ymin
00085    intParam(7) = ymax
00086    intParam(8) = mpi_xdim
00087    intParam(9) = mpi_ydim
00088 
00089    dblParam(1) = rhoL
00090    dblParam(2) = rhoH
00091    dblParam(3) = tauRho
00092    dblParam(4) = tauPhi
00093    dblParam(5) = IntWidth
00094    dblParam(6) = sigma
00095    dblParam(7) = Gamma
00096    dblParam(8) = pConv
00097 
00098 !  Read bubble positions
00099    OPEN(UNIT = 10, FILE = "discrete.in", STATUS = "OLD", ACTION = "READ", &
00100       IOSTAT = IO_ERR)
00101    IF ( IO_ERR == 0 ) THEN
00102      READ(10,*)
00103      READ(10,*) nBubbles
00104      READ(10,*)
00105      ALLOCATE( bubbles(1:nBubbles,1:3) )
00106      ALLOCATE( bubblesVec(1:nBubbles*3) )
00107      DO i = 1, nBubbles
00108        READ(10,*) bubblesVec(i), bubblesVec(i+nBubbles), bubblesVec(i+2*nBubbles)
00109      END DO
00110      CLOSE(UNIT = 10)
00111    ELSE
00112      CALL MPI_FINALIZE(MPI_ERR)
00113      STOP "Error: Unable to open input file 'discrete.in'."
00114    END IF
00115 
00116    intParam(10) = nBubbles
00117  END IF
00118  
00119 ! Broadcast values of parameters from the master to all other processors
00120  CALL MPI_BCAST(intParam, 10, MPI_INTEGER, master, MPI_COMM_WORLD, MPI_ERR)
00121  CALL MPI_BCAST(dblParam,  8, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, master, MPI_COMM_WORLD, MPI_ERR)
00122 
00123 ! Assign parameter data to local-named variables in slave nodes
00124  IF(proc /= master) THEN
00125    MaxStep  = intParam(1)
00126    tStat    = intParam(2)
00127    tDump    = intParam(3)
00128    xmin     = intParam(4)
00129    xmax     = intParam(5)
00130    ymin     = intParam(6)
00131    ymax     = intParam(7)
00132    mpi_xdim = intParam(8)
00133    mpi_ydim = intParam(9)
00134    nBubbles = intParam(10)
00135 
00136    rhoL     = dblParam(1)
00137    rhoH     = dblParam(2)
00138    tauRho   = dblParam(3)
00139    tauPhi   = dblParam(4)
00140    IntWidth = dblParam(5)
00141    sigma    = dblParam(6)
00142    Gamma    = dblParam(7)
00143    pConv    = dblParam(8)
00144 
00145    ALLOCATE( bubbles(1:nBubbles,1:3) )
00146    ALLOCATE( bubblesVec(1:nBubbles*3) )
00147  END IF
00148 
00149 !  Broadcast bubble(s) information from master to all other processors
00150  CALL MPI_BCAST(bubblesVec, nBubbles*3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, master, MPI_COMM_WORLD, MPI_ERR)
00151 
00152 !  Save in local array bubbles(xc,yc,Rc)
00153  DO i = 1, nBubbles
00154    bubbles(i,1) = bubblesVec(i)            ! xc(i)
00155    bubbles(i,2) = bubblesVec(i+nBubbles)   ! yc(i)
00156    bubbles(i,3) = bubblesVec(i+2*nBubbles) ! Rc(i)
00157  END DO
00158  DEALLOCATE( bubblesVec )
00159 
00160 ! Fluid properties
00161  phiStar    = 0.5D0*(rhoH - rhoL)
00162  phiStar2   = phistar*phistar
00163  phiStar4   = phistar2*phistar2
00164  eta        = 1.D0/(tauphi + 0.5D0)
00165  eta2       = 1.D0 - eta
00166  invEta2    = 0.5D0/eta
00167  invTauRho  = 1.D0/taurho
00168  invTauRho2 = 1.D0 - 0.5D0*invtaurho
00169  invTauPhi  = 1.D0/tauphi
00170 
00171 ! Chemical potential parameters
00172  alpha  = 0.75D0*sigma/(IntWidth*phiStar4)
00173  alpha4 = alpha*4.D0
00174  kappa  = 0.50D0*alpha*(IntWidth*phiStar)*(IntWidth*phiStar)
00175 
00176 ! Modified distribution weights for use in Collision
00177  Eg0T = Eg0C*invTauRho2
00178  Eg1T = Eg1C*invTauRho2
00179  Eg2T = Eg2C*invTauRho2
00180 
00181 ! Redefine MaxStep (iterate between 0 and Maxstep-1)
00182  MaxStep = MaxStep - 1
00183 
00184  RETURN
00185  END SUBROUTINE Parameters
Generated on Sun Jun 15 17:06:52 2008 for ZSC-2D-STD-MPI by  1.5.6
